title: CharAt (Method)
text:
METHOD CharAt : BYTE
This method returns the character at a specified position.
It should be only used to iterate through a string and must not
be called for positions after the trailing 0 character.
Attention! For instances storing a WSTRING: Valid values are
only returned if the character at the given position is an ASCII
character

rows.Name: iPosition
rows.Comment: The position (relative to 1) within the string to check
